Get to know UIC ECE        Undergraduate studies  An undergraduate education in ECE is the gateway to an incredibly promising career. Learn about our programs in computer engineering, electrical engineering, and engineering physics.       Graduate studies  Earn a master's or doctoral degree in the heart of Chicago, a center for scholarship and industry.       Faculty  Meet our 38 full-time faculty members who represent the best in theory and practice.       Research labs  Learn about the hubs of collaboration and innovation that drive UIC ECE.
